Parameter.Title: Find delivery places based on the recipient's postal code
Parameter.Description:
Optional post office is a service that allows an end user to choose the pickup point.

The 10 nearest pickup point are returned, based on the given postal code.

The URL is specified by /api/pickuppoint/postalcode/<postalcode>.<extension>

<extension> = xml | json

<postalcode> = a valid ZIP code

Example below: Delivery locations near postal code 1407 Vinterbro

Parameter.Title: Find delivery places based on optional location
Parameter.Description:
The 10 nearest pickup point are returned, based on the given postal code.

The URL is specified by /api/pickuppoint/location/<latitude>/<longitude>.<extension>

<extension> = xml | json

Example below: Delivery Locations near the position of Oslo city (60.395226, 5.321725)

Parameter.Title: Filter results by text
Parameter.Description:
Is specified by adding ?searchForText=<text> to the URL.

You can search by name, address, city, municipality name, county name or location, and the search string can include partial names / criteria's.

Example below: Search for text "KIWI" near postal code 1407.

Parameter.Title: Filter results by open on days
Parameter.Description:
Is specified by adding ?openingHoursSearchType=<day> to the URL.

Require that the place is open on the day(s) as specified.

<day> = ALL_WEEKDAYS (default) | MONDAY | TUESDAY | WEDNESDAY | THURSDAY | FRIDAY | SATURDAY | SUNDAY

If you want you can also add openOnOrBefore and / or openOnOrAfter, to limit the search even more.

Example below: opening hours on SUNDAY near postal code 1407

Parameter.Title: Filter results by opening hours (on or before)
Parameter.Description:
Is specified by adding ?openOnOrBefore=<time> to the URL.

Require that the place is open on the specified time.

<time> format: HHMM

Example below: Open on or before 0800 near postal code 1407

Parameter.Title: Filter results by opening hours (on or after)
Parameter.Description:
Is spesified by adding ?openOnOrAfter=<time> to the URL.

Requires that the place is open on the specified time.

<time> format: HHMM

Example below: Open on or after 2200 near postal code 1407
